Headline: #77 Belmont Temporary Westbound Reroute near Belmont/Kostner
ShortDescription: Westbound 77 Belmont buses are temporarily rerouted via Belmont, Pulaski, Diversey, Cicero and Belmont: due to, street blockage near Belmont/Kostner.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Westbound #77 Belmont buses are temporarily rerouted via Belmont, Pulaski, Diversey, Cicero and Belmont: due to, street blockage near Belmont/Kostner.

Eastbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Brown Line Service Delayed at Merchandise Mart
ShortDescription: Brown Line trains are standing at Merchandise Mart due to a raised bridge over the Chicago River. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Brown Line trains are standing at Merchandise Mart due to a raised bridge over the Chicago River. 

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
